definition: not to pose a problem for sb/cannot stump sb
difficult (to...)/problem/difficulty/difficult/not good
disaster/distress/to scold
(negative prefix)/not/no
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit

sentences.english: The world can not conquers your Dad.
sentences.chinese: 天下事难不倒你的爸爸。

sentences.english: This kind of laundry detergent can clean the most difficult smudges.
sentences.chinese: 再难洗的污渍都难不倒这种洗衣粉。

sentences.english: But such trifles haven’t slowed down Paul.
sentences.chinese: 但这点小事显然难不倒“保罗”。

sentences.english: This can not beat Zhang Fei, he decided to street performers.
sentences.chinese: 这可难不倒张飞，他决定到街头卖艺。

sentences.english: A hero is never put off by difficulties.
